dg:extension.desc: Use logic to control what dialog is shown. No options to configure.

dg:cmd.name: if
dg:cmd.desc: If [condition] is true, show the contained dialog.

dg:cmd.name: elseif
dg:cmd.desc: If [condition] is true, show the contained dialog. Only used after if.

dg:cmd.name: else
dg:cmd.desc: If no preceeding conditions are true, show the contained dialog.

dg:cmd.name: endif
dg:cmd.desc: End a chain of if/else conditions.
